findings.title: Owner can change _maxWalletToken and _maxTxAmount
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify _maxWalletToken and _maxTxAmount variables.

findings.title: Owner can change sellMultiplier
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the sellMultiplier variable.

findings.title: Owner can change trading
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change trading settings.

findings.title: Owner can change blacklist mode
findings.description: The owner has privileges to change blacklist mode.

findings.title: Owner can change maxRoomRent value
findings.description: The owner has privileges to modify the maxRoomRent value.

findings.title: Owner can change cooldown settings
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify cooldown settings.

findings.title: Owner can multiTransfer fixed and listed token amounts
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to transfer fixed and listed token amounts, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can withdraw contract BNBs
findings.description: Authorized addresses have permission to withdraw contract BNBs without restrictions.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from dividends
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the capability to include or exclude certain addresses from receiving dividends.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can include in and exclude from fee, timelock and transaction amount
findings.description: Authorized addresses have excessive privileges to modify critical contract settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fees
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the ability to modify fee settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change fee receivers
findings.description: The contract allows authorized addresses to modify fee receivers, which could lead to unauthorized changes to the fee distribution mechanism.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change swap threshold and disable/enable swap
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify swap settings, including changing the swap threshold and enabling/disabling swaps.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change targetLiquidity
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to modify targetLiquidity settings.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution criteria
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to alter the distribution criteria, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Authorized addresses can change distribution GAS
findings.description: Authorized addresses have the privilege to alter the distribution of GAS, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The function manage_blacklist() uses a loop to change blacklist status of addresses and could be aborted with OUT_OF_GAS exception if there will be a long addresses list.

findings.title: Sending token amounts to burnFeeReceiver instead of burning
findings.description: Token amounts are sent to burnFeeReceiver instead of being burned, which does not decrease the total supply.
